about_the_game: This DLC will provide you will the complete guide book to view in game via the in-game phone app, giving you hints and tips on the game and some of the routes within it.

content_descriptors.notes:
This product includes various images showcasing female characters in the nude or performing sexual acts.

All characters included are over the age of 21.

The DLC adds new content to the game: Maid Cafe.

detailed_description: This DLC will provide you will the complete guide book to view in game via the in-game phone app, giving you hints and tips on the game and some of the routes within it.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Maid Cafe - Guidebook App

  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
